This Skill does not trigger Defense Skills and cannot gain E.G.O resources

1121321.name: Aim for the Gap
1121321.desc: 1 ally with the highest Speed: When using a Base Attack Skill, if this unit's Speed is faster than the main target's, inflict [Disarming] on the target for every 3 Speed difference (max 2 per turn)

1121301.name: Purge Enforcer of the Famiglie
1121301.desc:
When this unit kills an enemy or breaks a Part, gain 1 [PenetrateResultUp] next turn (once per turn)

When using a Base Attack Skill, if this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, inflict [Disarming] on the target for every 2 Speed difference (max 1 per turn)

After ally Attack using Base Attack Skills, if the enemy(Core) has 20%- HP, use 'Mercé' on the target (once per turn)

1121302.name: Painless Mercy
1121302.desc: Unless Reused via external effects, Night Awl Capitano Gregor's Skill 'Mercé' can be used up to 2 times per turn

1121311.name: Purge Enforcer of the Famiglie
1121311.desc:
When this unit kills an enemy or breaks a Part, gain 2 [PenetrateResultUp] next turn (once per turn)

When using a Base Attack Skill, if this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, inflict [Disarming] on the target for every 2 Speed difference (max 2 per turn)

After ally Attack using Base Attack Skills, if the enemy(Core) has 20%- HP, use 'Mercé' on the target (once per turn)
- If there is only 1 surviving enemy after an attack, this Passive also activates when the target is Staggered

notes.short: Applies {status:HurtNightStiletto}, converts to {status:CriHurtNightStiletto} at 2 stacks. Using S3 on a target with {status:CriHurtNightStiletto} uses S3-2 instead and converts it into {status:HorrHurtNightStiletto}. The 3 versions inflict an increasing amount of {status:Binding} and {status:Laceration} Count on {status:VibrationExplosion}. His passive also lets him use a free S1-2 as a follow up to ally attacks when the target is at low HP or staggered (if alone).
notes.full:
His regular skills all inflict 1 {status:HurtNightStiletto} each. At 2 stacks, it converts into 3 stacks of {status:CriHurtNightStiletto}, which goes down by 1 stack each turn and cannot be replenished. If the target has {status:CriHurtNightStiletto}, his S3 uses his S3-2 instead and converts it into {status:HorrHurtNightStiletto}. Each version of Wound inflicts {status:Binding} on the target with the later stages inflicting more stacks. {status:CriHurtNightStiletto} also inflicts 1 {status:Laceration} Count on {status:VibrationExplosion}, while {status:HorrHurtNightStiletto} inflicts +3 Count. The S3-2 is just a stronger version of S3 that deals more damage, has {status:SuperCoin}, increased application of {status:Vibration} and {status:Laceration}, and additional {status:VibrationExplosion}s.

Both versions of S3 trigger {status:Switch_Vibration} into {status:VibrationBleeding} which deals bonus {keyword:Lust} damage based on the average of the target's {status:Laceration} and {status:Vibration} Potencies on {status:VibrationExplosion} while maintaining any of {status:Vibration}'s usual effects.

His passive allows him to use his S1-2 as a free follow up attack whenever an ally's attack brings an enemy to below 20% HP or, if the enemy is alone, staggers it. His S1-2 is a weak single coin skill that gets a significant damage bonus based on the target's missing HP. It also inflicts {status:HurtNightStiletto}. His S2 and base S3 can also trigger a free S1-2 follow up if the target has 20%- HP or {status:HorrHurtNightStiletto}. The base S3 can also trigger it on stagger. His passive also gives him {status:PenetrateResultUp} on kills.
